# Analysis
- California demographic data supplemented with vehicle populations by fuel type via the California Energy Commission and Zillow Home Value Index

<br>
<br>

# What We Found
- EV adoption rates remain fairly low within California
- Drivers of electric vehicles are found almost exclusively within the largest population centers in the state
- Within many of the most populous zip codes ownership rates remain low
- Strong correlation toward adoption in zip codes where single-family home values and household income are highest
